repnme.cdata!:
Tanzania - Second National Sites and
            Services Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of provision of
            infrastructure services to areas including about 16,000
            houses in existing squatter neighborhoods, preparation of
            about 19,000 surveyed plots in planned residential layouts,
            community facilities in the upgraded areas, house
            improvement and construction loans, an experimental program
            assisting the informal sector in two project towns, and
            provision for equipment/vehicles and technical assistance to
            support the various project components. Together, these
            components represent a major proportion of the
            Government's National Sites and Services Program over
            the next three years.

docna.cdata!:
Tanzania - Second National Sites and
            Services Project
